item.title: Firewall Configurations
item.description: 4/19/2022: So I decided to make the transition from Ubuntu 20.04 LTS to Fedora Workstation 36 Beta as my host operating system. Over the years, I have become incredibly frustrated with Ubuntu regarding the numerous changes implemented by Canonical (e.g., Snaps, Synaptic, etc. ). These changes have been troublesome because this is an operating system that I have been using since 2008 when I first started my return to studying information technology.
